channel.title: Comments on: Faster JavaScript
channel.description: On programming and text editing. Addicted to lisps.

item.title: By: Question Answer
item.dc:creator: Question Answer
item.description: Pretty interesting technique. Never thought of using "Delete" instead of "Null". But got your point and I think it works. Brilliantly done, I will keep your tips on mind while coding.
item.content:encoded: Pretty interesting technique. Never thought of using “Delete” instead of “Null”. But got your point and I think it works. Brilliantly done, I will keep your tips on mind while coding.
